remarks: A monomorphism is a morphism.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)
statement:
ismon.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
ismon.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` C ) $.
ismon.o $e |- .x. = ( comp ` C ) $.
ismon.s $e |- M = ( Mono ` C ) $.
ismon.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
ismon.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
ismon.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
monhom $p |- ( ph -> ( X M Y ) C_ ( X H Y ) ) $.
